titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3196) making appropriations for foreign operations, export financing, and related programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2000, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-450, by Mr. Diaz-Balart.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3196 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Provides that the amendment printed in H. Rept. 106-450 shall be in order without intervention of any point of order without intervention of any point of order or demand for a division of the question.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 152.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 362.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/4/1999--Introduced. Provides for the consideration of H.R. 3196 (making appropriations for foreign operations export financing, and related programs for FY 2000).
